title: Chris Yuhan Liu
text:
I am Chris Liu (he/him), a second-year undergraduate student at California Polytechnic State University passionate about anything statistics and data science!
Feel free to contact me via email!

title: Debut Blog
text:
This is the first time in a while where I have written purely for the joy of it.
I find myself curious about a number of subjects. Conveying my interest with words is not the only form of expression. I hope to write, not to be judged by a reader, but for my own fulfillment.
As I write my first blog of 2025, I am overwhelmed with endless responsibilites. So forgive me if my blogs are few.
Chris

title: Blog
text:
